Locked Missile Expansion.text_desc: Missile capacity {Locked MissilesChanged} by {Locked Missiles} - Launcher still required

Super Missile Expansion.text_desc: Super Missile capacity {Super MissilesChanged} by {Super Missiles}

Locked Super Missile Expansion.text_desc: Super Missile capacity {Locked Super MissilesChanged} by {Locked Super Missiles} - Launcher still required

Power Bomb Expansion.text_desc: Power Bomb capacity {Power BombsChanged} by {Power Bombs}

Locked Power Bomb Expansion.text_desc: Power Bomb capacity {Locked Power BombsChanged} by {Locked Power Bombs} - Launcher still required

Missile Launcher.text_desc: Missiles can now be fired. Missile capacity {MissilesChanged} by {Missiles}

Super Missile Launcher.text_desc: Super Missiles can now be fired. Super Missile capacity {Super MissilesChanged} by {Super Missiles}

Power Bomb Launcher.text_desc: Power Bombs can now be used. Power Bomb capacity {Power BombsChanged} by {Power Bombs}

Metroid DNA.text_desc: Collect all DNA in order to reach the Queen

Bombs.text_desc: Press | in Morph Ball to deploy

Spider Ball.text_desc: Press or hold | in Morph Ball mode to climb walls

Screw Attack.text_desc: Jump into enemies to inflict massive damage

Speed Booster.text_desc: Run continuously to begin Speed Boosting

Wave Beam.text_desc: Beams can now go through solid objects

Spazer Beam.text_desc: Beams now have a wider range

Super Missile Drop.text_desc: Super Missiles refilled by {Super Missile Drop}

Power Bomb Drop.text_desc: Power Bombs refilled by {Power Bomb Drop}

Speed Booster Upgrade.text_desc: Reduces the time to charge Speed Booster
